snippet: Before taking a trip to a factory in Germany, the writer thought he would need to make drastic changes to his own business. But now he realizes he should proceed in a more modest way.
abstract: Before taking a trip to a factory in Germany, the writer thought he would need to make drastic changes to his own business. But now he realizes he should proceed in a more modest way.

headline.main: I Have Seen the Future of Manufacturing, Part 2
